[SYNTAX]: Awkward phrasing in long, complex sentences (e.g., "In the first place, as you know, I deciphered--after discovering it quite by accident--what was probably a proto-man's dying message...").
[PUNCTUATION]: Misplaced punctuation in dialogue (e.g., "the bulletin said" at the end of a sentence instead of integrating dialogue tags).
[LEXICON]: Overuse of repetitive phrases ("Nothing. Nothing.") and vague terms ("a jungle of interstellar wrecks all about them").

[LOGIC]: Sudden shifts in perspective (e.g., from the letter’s exposition to Ramsey’s internal monologue without clear transitions).
[CLARITY]: Ambiguous references (e.g., "the Vegan girl" introduced mid-narrative without prior context).
[STRUCTURE]: Disjointed progression from the letter’s conclusion to Ramsey’s actions in the Spacer Graveyard, creating a narrative jump.

[GRAMMAR]: "At present, an autocratic bureaucracy with no one man at the top" lacks a subject and proper conjunction.
[SYNTAX]: "Garr Symm, absolute dictator of the galaxy, if he played his hand right" misplaces the clause for clarity.
[PUNCTUATION]: Ellipsis in "keep her from reading...." is stylistically abrupt but acceptable for effect.

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt shift from Ramsey’s narrative to Chind’s section without transitional context.

[TRANSITION]: Jump from Vardin’s actions to Chind’s plot weakens narrative flow.

[SYNTAX]: Repetition of "for nothing" in "X stands for nothing for nothing for nothing" creates awkward phrasing.
[LEXICON]: Overuse of technical jargon (e.g., "proto-man," "hyper-space") may feel forced in dialogue.
[PUNCTUATION]: Comma splice in "The qualities of radar," Garr Symm said, "exist in their totality..." (though common in dialogue, it slightly disrupts flow).

[LOGIC]: Sudden shift from the Enterprise's hyper-space discussion to the Dog Star crew's tracking feels abrupt, lacking transitional context.
[CLARITY]: The concept of "shoals in hyper-space" is introduced without prior explanation, risking confusion for readers unfamiliar with sci-fi conventions.
[STRUCTURE]: The philosophical interlude about proto-man and time interrupts the action, creating a minor disconnect in narrative pacing.
